entities.name: ron

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the story who is responding to Ron's question.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is another character in the story who is speculating about what the objects in the tank are.

entities.name: luna

entities.name: aquavirius maggots

entities.name: brains

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is an organization that Luna's dad mentioned as being involved with Aquavirius maggots.

entities.name: tank
entities.description: The tank is a glass container filled with water and objects.

relationships.description: Harry responded to Ron's question about what the objects in the tank are.
Ginny was speculating about what the objects in the tank were.
Luna mentioned Aquavirius maggots as being similar to what's in the tank.
Hermione looked at the tank and made an observation about what was inside.
Harry joined Hermione at the tank to examine the objects more closely.
Hermione identified the objects in the tank as brains.
